statements: UPDATE game_currency_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE game_currency_transactions SET player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002', transaction_type = 'purchase', transaction_date = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
UPDATE game_currency_transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.50, transaction_type = 'purchase' WHERE transaction_id = '4d53254e-12a0-4d7e-a0c4-104e803b02db';
UPDATE game_currency_transactions SET transaction_date = '2022-06-30 10:30:00', player_id = '1eaecc11-9857-4a76-8c87-109c4e502b9d' WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
UPDATE CurrencyTransactions SET transaction_type = 'DEPOSIT' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Players SET total_currency_balance = total_currency_balance + 500 WHERE player_id = '98765432-1234-aaaa-bbbb-098765432111';
UPDATE CurrencyTransactions SET currency_amount = 500, transaction_type = 'Deposit' WHERE transaction_id = 'a16bb8c3-0b01-4f39-9c25-7770083d6d7b';
UPDATE Players SET total_currency_balance = total_currency_balance - 100, player_name = 'Alice' WHERE player_id = '4473d41c-5d5b-404d-9144-0ffd270b6fa1';
UPDATE currency_transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET genre = 'Adventure' WHERE game_id = 5;
UPDATE currency_transactions SET amount = amount + 1000, transaction_type = 'Bonus' WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE players SET email = CONCAT('new_', email) WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE indie_games SET genre='RPG' WHERE game_id='7fa396df-6d4b-4cf1-b679-0f7387106f5a';

UPDATE players SET email = 'new_email@example.com', date_of_birth = '1995-08-15' WHERE player_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-cdef-1234567890ab';
UPDATE players SET coins = coins + 100 WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
